Performs bilinear interpolation between four values.

Parameters:
v00 First, or top left value
v01 Second, or top right value
v10 Third, or bottom left value
v11 Fourth, or bottom right value
xPercent Interpolation value on the X axis, between 0.0 and 1.0
yPercent Interpolation value on fht Y axis, between 0.0 and 1.0
Returns:
The bilinearly interpolated result
